snippet: A medical marijuana dispensary that was shut down by a United States attorney reopened within a week, just three doors away from the original site.
lead_paragraph: A medical marijuana dispensary that was shut down by a United States attorney reopened within a week, just three doors away from the original site.

headline.main: Medical Marijuana Dispensary in Oakland Is Focus of Federal Government
headline.seo: Richard Lee’s Medical Marijuana Dispensary in Oakland Is Shut Down and Quickly Reopens
headline.print_headline: Dispensary Is Focus Of Federal Government
